### Hello there! Welcome to my profile!
I am Deepak kumar. I am enthusiasm to explore in research psychology background. i belongs to Agra, Uttar Pradesh. i have worked as research assistant in university of allahabad and st.johns college which is affilation by Dr. B. R. Ambedkar University, Agra.

My academic path has been shaped by a strong interdisciplinary background and meaningful research experiences. During my time at the University of Allahabad, I had the privilege of engaging deeply with research, which refined my critical thinking and analytical skills. 

I am a content creator on social media platforms, specializing in unique and generative content. To enhance my expertise in content creation, I continuously improve my skills in software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, CapCut, and Final Cut Pro.
